long_description: The maps in the 2i3D 3D Atlas of Zion National Park may appear blurry to the naked eye, but slip on the included glasses and see the same images emerge in eye-popping 3D contrast. Each turn of a page reveals 2 views of the same area: the right page shows the U.S. Geological Survey topographical view while the left page shows a color aerial photo. 39 aerial photos accompanied by 39 topographic maps cover 407 square miles of Utah's Zion National Park; maps are a scale of 1:24,000. Includes 2 pairs of red/cyan glasses for 3D viewing. Copyright 2011; 2i3D Stereo Imaging; 86 pages; softcover.
short_description: The maps in the 2i3D 3D Atlas of Zion National Park may appear blurry to the naked eye, but slip on the included glasses and see the same images emerge in eye-popping 3D contrast.
